function.name: domain_search
function.description: Search domain availability. Check availability and pricing for one or more domain names. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

query.description: Domain name to search (without TLD, e.g. "myagent").

tlds.description: Comma-separated TLDs to check (e.g. "com,xyz,io"). Defaults to common TLDs.

function.name: domain_quote
function.description: Get price quote. Get a time-limited price quote for registering a domain. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

domain.description: Fully qualified domain name to quote.

function.name: domain_register
function.description: Register domain. Register a domain using a valid quote. Price: dynamic (from quote) via x402 (USDC on Base).

quote_id.description: Quote ID from POST /v1/domains/quote. Valid for 15 minutes.

function.name: domain_recover
function.description: Recover registration. Retry Cloudflare zone creation and/or nameserver configuration after a partial failure during `POST /v1/domains/register`. Free — no payment required.

recovery_token.description: Recovery token from the original RegisterResponse.

function.name: domain_status
function.description: Registration status. Check the full post-registration pipeline status for a domain your wallet registered. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_configure_ns
function.description: Configure nameservers. Retry nameserver configuration at the registrar for a domain your wallet registered. Free — no payment required.

function.name: domain_zone_create
function.description: Create zone. Create a Cloudflare DNS zone for a domain. Price: $0.05 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_list
function.description: List zones. Returns all DNS zones owned by the paying wallet address. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

limit.description: Number of zones per page (1–100, default 20).

function.name: domain_zone_get
function.description: Get zone. Returns details for a single zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_delete
function.description: Delete zone. Deletes a Cloudflare DNS zone and all its records. Price: $0.01 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_activate
function.description: Activate zone. Request Cloudflare to immediately re-check nameserver activation for a pending zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_verify
function.description: Verify zone propagation. Check DNS propagation for a zone — verifies nameservers and all DNS records. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_zone_mail_setup
function.description: Setup mail DNS records. Configure all DNS records required for email delivery: MX, SPF (TXT), DMARC (TXT), and optionally DKIM (TXT). Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

mail_server_ip.description: Mail server IP address for the A record.

function.name: domain_record_batch
function.description: Batch record operations. Create, update, and delete DNS records in a single request. Price: $0.005 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_create
function.description: Create record. Create a single DNS record in a zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

name.description: Record name relative to zone root. Use "@" for root.

content.description: Record content (IP for A/AAAA, hostname for CNAME/MX, text for TXT).

function.name: domain_record_list
function.description: List records. Returns all DNS records in a zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_get
function.description: Get record. Returns a single DNS record. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_update
function.description: Update record. Update a DNS record. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).

function.name: domain_record_delete
function.description: Delete record. Delete a DNS record from a zone. Price: $0.001 via x402 (USDC on Base).
